posting_times.evidence: Industry research (Sprout Social, Buffer 2025): 10 AM, 1 PM, 5 PM EST are peak feed engagement windows

visual_style.current_best: lifelike photorealistic imagery with cinematic composition, strong singular focal point, no text or overlays in generated image
visual_style.color_trends: natural warm tones, golden hour lighting, high contrast with organic color palettes
visual_style.hook_style: striking visual contrast, unusual perspective, or emotional resonance to stop the scroll â€” no text hooks
visual_style.ai_generation_notes: Use camera reference terms (e.g. 'shot on Canon EOS R5, 85mm, shallow depth of field') to achieve lifelike realism. Specify natural imperfections: visible pores, worn edges, dust particles, natural asymmetry. Avoid close-up hands and multiple interacting figures. Add negative prompts: no text, no watermarks, no signs with writing. Use natural-language descriptions over keyword stacking for Grok Imagine.
